attributes.action: Continue lockdown, including school closures until at least Sept 2020.
attributes.additional_details: I think the number one priority has to be protecting lives and I think the sign of a good leader is showing you will always find a way to put your people first. These are moments that will go down in history along with the decisions made!
attributes.background: Put lives before the economy! Where possible all businesses to implement home working as a permanent way forward. Virtual schooling, for children whilst keeping teachers/school staff safe. Online shopping for non essential businesses with home delivery etc to become the new norm.
